scripts.build: rm scripts/livre3d/react/compiled/*.js && babel scripts/livre3d/react/jsx -d scripts/livre3d/react/compiled --presets react && browserify scripts/livre3d/requirements.js -o public/scripts/livre3d/index.js && stylus stylus -o public/stylesheets
scripts.build-scripts: rm scripts/livre3d/react/compiled/*.js && babel scripts/livre3d/react/jsx -d scripts/livre3d/react/compiled --presets react && browserify scripts/livre3d/requirements.js -o public/scripts/livre3d/index.js
